name: Siranda Torvaldsen
description: The part that really resonated with me was the bit about during a lecture, some students will be struggling to keep up, whilst for others it will be too slow. Many of the students I teach come from very different academic backgrounds, so for some the information I am imparting is all new (and for those students I probably gloss over it too quickly), whilst for others it is very basic and just revision.

name: Siranda Torvaldsen
description: As a result of my readings and watching this video, I have become convinced that this flipped classroom approach is a far superior teaching method than the traditional lecture. It is a more efficient use of face-to-face time.
